name: Shards Of Light
description:
Each level is 3d, but you perceive it as 2d. By pressing Space you freeze and change the view. Pressing Space again changes the view back.

Each 2d world has its own inhabitants. If you touch at least one of them it will immediately die, making tainting your light and losing movement speed.

Controls

WASD/Arrows - to move and jump

Space - change the view

ESC - pause the game
